0: Hotel lobby bar needs a little updating to make it more modern
The noise of the renovation starts at 9 am up to 6 pm
Entire hotel in renovation with VERY high building noice each day from 9 am to 6pm
We stayed while construction and remodeling of the rooms were going on too much noise during the morning
Upon check in I was given one of the newly renovated rooms which really do not lack anything
It is a disgrace that the hotel is open while there is a big renovation going on
Also you have to inform guests that you are having renovation
Breakfast was really poor even if it was served in some temporary place due to some renovation
Hotel stay would have been great had it not been for the renovation noise that woke us up each day at 8 am
1: Stayed here for 8 nights in early March during their big after renovations party
This hotel is outstanding great location beautiful renovation large rooms very clean a truely quality property
Our Corner Suite was newly renovated at the time so it was spacious clean and modern
Both the room and the common parts are just stunning and recently renovated in an Art Deco style
First are the people everyone seems very proud of their newly refurbished hotel and are warm and welcoming at every turn
The rooms were recently redone and we just loved the modern decor including beautiful hardwood floors

Overall we had a very solid stay this hotel has great hardware with nicely done renovations free breakfast for elite guests and suite upgrade so I am not sure there is a whole lot more I could ask for
The people were friendly beds super comfy room very clean and updated with full bathtub and separate shower
Lovely hotel recently renovated excellent service
Beautiful hotel after renovation just stunning unfortunately the staff is really bad
